title._content: Catalogue of Books, Deseronto Public Library (1896), pp.8-9

description._content:
Pages 8 and 9 of the 1896 catalogue of books in Deseronto Public Library, Deseronto, Ontario, continuing Class F (fiction) and with an advertisement for James Fairbairn's photographic studio:

"City Art Studio
Geddis Block, Deseronto, Ont.
J. Fairbairn
Photographic Artist
Don't forget that the most popular place to get your Photos is at this Studio. Portraits in all the latest styles and sizes.
Copying and Enlarging done in the latest styles of finish.
THE FLASH LIGHT
They also have the Flash Light, the best and most improved machine: it makes a light as bright as day, and positively no noise, no smoke. It is just the thing for groups at parties or in Lodge rooms. If you want any of this class of Photos taken remember you can get them without going to outsiders. Satisfaction guaranteed.
Studio Main Street."
